translations: 坚定的；始终不渝的；不歪的

sentences.sentence: He was an unswerving empiricist with little time for theory.
sentences.translation: 他是一位坚定不渝的经验主义者，鲜有时间去研究理论。

sentences.sentence: One of the great things about our species is the unswerving desire to explore and discover.
sentences.translation: 我们这个物种最伟大的地方，就是我们对探索和发现的执著渴望。

sentences.sentence: His unswerving support for the Iraq war has alienated the swing voters who swooned over him in 2000.
sentences.translation: 他对伊战的坚定支持疏远了2000大选中为他投票的摇摆者。
